HowTo Course

The ATutor HowTo course is available for download as test Content Packages and Common Cartridges. The HowTo course is also available as an ATutor Course Backup that can be restored into a newly created course. The content of the course is obsolete, but it serves well to demonstrate interoperability, and the ongoing consistency of content interoperability standards in ATutor, using content packages that were created more than 5 years ago

ATutor 1.4.3 HowTo

  • Browse HowTo 1.4.3 Online as an ATutor course.
  • Download ATutor 1.4.3 HowTo System Course Backup (1.9 MB ZIP)
  • IMS/SCORM Content Packages (Viewer included):
    • HowTo (Entire Course) (2 MB ZIP)
      • HowTo Chapter 1: Getting Started (156 KB ZIP)
      • HowTo Chapter 2: Navigation (111 KB ZIP)
      • HowTo Chapter 3: Learners (449 KB ZIP)
      • HowTo Chapter 4: Instructors (911 KB ZIP)
      • HowTo Chapter 5: Administrators (466 KB ZIP)
  • IMS Common Cartridges:
    • HowTo (Entire Course) (2 MB ZIP)
      • HowTo Chapter 1: Getting Started (144 KB ZIP)
      • HowTo Chapter 2: Navigation (99 KB ZIP)
      • HowTo Chapter 3: Learners (435 KB ZIP)
      • HowTo Chapter 4: Instructors (896 KB ZIP)
      • HowTo Chapter 5: Administrators (452 KB ZIP)

ATutor 1.4.2 HowTo

  • Browse HowTo 1.4.2 Online as an ATutor course.
  • Download ATutor 1.4.2 HowTo System Course Backup (1.5 MB ZIP)
  • Standards Compliant (IMS/SCORM) Content Packages (Viewer included):
    • HowTo (Entire Course) (1.5 MB ZIP)
      • HowTo Chapter 1: Welcome (N/A)
      • HowTo Chapter 2: Getting Started (127 KB ZIP)
      • HowTo Chapter 3: Navigation (118 KB ZIP)
      • HowTo Chapter 4: Learners (419 KB ZIP)
      • HowTo Chapter 5: Instructors (701 KB ZIP)
      • HowTo Chapter 6: Administrators (258 KB ZIP)
